colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039A *, ,(CES MA GCIG KHROS MA NAG MO LHA LNGA'I SGRUB THABS KYI TSIG DON RNAM PAR BSHAD PA MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS RGYAN CES BYA BA 'DI NI, GSO BA RIG PA'I GNAS LA RNAM DPYOD KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA H'AL HA SMAN RAMS PA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS 'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI SNANG BRNYAN KHYAD 'PHAGS LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS TE LO SNGA PHYIR NAN TAN DU BSKUL TE MGO BRTZAMS KYANG GA-YENG BA'I DBANG GIS RIM 'GYANGS SU LUS PA LAS, NYE CHAR GZHUNG BRGYA SMRA BA'I DBANG PO RDO RAMS PA GNAS BRTAN RGYA MTSOS MJUG RDZOGS PAR GRUB PA ZHIG CIS KYANG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^SANGS RGYAS KUN 'DUS KYI NGO BO BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG YAB SRAS RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN LA BRTEN NAS, LUGS 'DI'I SMIN BYED CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA RDZOGS PAR THOB PA'I BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'I DGE BA'I MTHU LA BRTEN NAS BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO'I RING LUGS MDO SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI BSTAN PA RIN CHEN MI NUS PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SRID PA'I RTZE MO'I BAR DU BSGRENGS TE, SKYE DGU MTHA' DAG DON GNYIS LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I DGA' STON LA 'DOD DGUR LONGS SPYOD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
